attributes.additional_details: MEDIA TALKS ABOUT ASIAN GANGS WHICH IS 98% PAKISTANI  STOP THE MISREPRESENTATION IN MEDIA
attributes.background: I AM A HINDU. DON'T USE THE ASIAN TO DESCRIBE PAKISTANI GANGS EXPLOITING YOUNG GIRLS

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be the responsibility of the media organisations. You could make a complaint directly to them.
